attribs.name: npc_content
attribs.current:
Traits

**Nimble Escape**: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

 Actions

**Scimitar**: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

**Shortbow**: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KOlLo-KccYBXMoFg5il_desc
attribs.current: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-KOlLo-KccYBXMoFg5il_description
attribs.current: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MQU3XqJxAjn6wuAdiTb_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MQU3XqJxAjn6wuAdiTb_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MQU3Zx0PKeDcsQQxzuK_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MQU3bBzXHi3WrY3LMEw_spelldescription
attribs.current: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MQU3bBzXHi3WrY3LMEw_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3eAItAwiIP-Tfjcf_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3eAItAwiIP-Tfjcf_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3eAItAwiIP-Tfjcf_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3g1ev-9WR3D61qzz_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3g1ev-9WR3D61qzz_spelldescription
attribs.current: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn’t understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it. Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the GM determines how the target behaves. If the target can’t follow your command, the spell ends. Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you. Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn. Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means. Grovel. The target falls prone and then ends its turn. Halt. The target doesn’t move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3g1ev-9WR3D61qzz_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3hVz5RoGZHmDz2cn_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MQU3hVz5RoGZHmDz2cn_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MQU3kIEtiDFDNdWR5b6_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target on additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MQU3kIEtiDFDNdWR5b6_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small, straight piece of iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MQU3kIEtiDFDNdWR5b6_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MQU3kIEtiDFDNdWR5b6_spelltarget
attribs.current: A humanoid that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MQU3lyYPJlEj8xQso8f_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot 3rd level of or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above the 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MQU3lyYPJlEj8xQso8f_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell’s effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MQU4741TOejUFqgQqMI_description
attribs.current: The ice goblin is wearing snow shoes, ignoring difficult terrain caused by sand or snow.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MQVmMc13JpTPd1lM1vT_description
attribs.current: The ice goblin shaman is a 4th level spellcaster. It's casting ability is Wisdom, spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks.
